about.title: Smile with **B of Bueno**
about.description: We offer a wide range of specialties and we have the latest technology in dental procedures, so you can have a complete and personalized dental treatment.

services.title: Dental Design
services.description: Improve the appearance of your smile, aligning color, shape and size of your teeth for a harmonious look.

services.title: Dental Implants
services.description: Recover your smile with durable dental implants. Solutions of high quality to restore functionality and aesthetics.

services.title: Dental Orthodontics
services.description: Align your teeth and improve your oral health with modern orthodontics. Achieve a perfect smile with exceptional results.

services.title: Medical Tourism
services.description: Combine your dental treatment with a vacation. Enjoy exclusive attention in a relaxing and memorable environment.

services.title: Radiology
services.description: Precise diagnostics with advanced technology. We obtain high quality images for a complete dental treatment.

services.title: Dental Surgery
services.description: Specialized procedures to solve complex problems. Our experts guarantee safe and complete oral care.

services.title: Dental Pediatrics
services.description: Oral health care for children. We promote healthy habits and a positive experience, safe and fun for the little ones.

services.title: Periodontics
services.description: Specialized treatment for healthy gums. We prevent diseases and offer durable solutions for your oral health.

faq.title: Our **FAQ**
faq.contactText2: We are here to help you

questions.question: What makes Dental Bueno unique?
questions.answer: Dental Bueno is a dental clinic that offers quality services at an affordable price. We have a team of highly trained professionals and the latest technology in dental procedures, so you can have a complete and personalized dental treatment.

questions.question: What services does Dental Bueno offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of specialties and we have the latest technology in dental procedures, so you can have a complete and personalized dental treatment.

questions.question: How can I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: You can schedule an appointment through our website or by calling our customer service center.

questions.question: What hours of operation does Dental Bueno have?
questions.answer: Our operating hours are from Monday to Friday from 8:00 to 18:00 hours.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, credit and debit cards.
